import React from "react" import "./about.css" import AboutImg from "../../assets/about.png"; import CV from "../../assets/Resume.pdf"; import fileImg from "../../assets/files.svg" const About = () => { return (

About Me

My introduction

A Data Science major at the UC, San Diego. Inspired by Baymax from "Big Hero 6," I've been passionate about machine learning, artificial intelligence, and computer vision. The idea of using technology to make an impact on people's lives drew me to this field, and I've been passionate about exploring the possibilities of computer science ever since.

Beyond academics, I enjoy weight lifting, playing basketball and badminton, hanging out with friends and eating delicious food. I'm always eager to learn about new technologies and collaborate on projects that make a difference!

Download Resume
); }; export default About
